name: Buddypress Activity Anywhere
author: Eyal Fitoussi

sections.description:
This is a simple that adds an activity button to the admin toolbar in the fron-end. Once a user (logged in) clicks on the button the activity form will pop up. The form will have a text area for the user to enter anything he want to post in his activity.
When the user submit the form the plugin will post the info to his activity stream.

Checkout the premium version for extra features
sections.installation:
1. Install and activate buddypress. In a multisite installation you must “Network Activate” Buddypress it in order to use “BP Activity Anywhere” plugin sitewide.
  2. Upload the folder bp-activity-anywhere to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory or install directly from the plugins page in the admin area of your site
  3. Activate “BP Activity Anywhere” through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress . In a multisite installation you can “Network Activate” it in order to use it sitewide.
sections.faq: 1. for any questions, error report and suggestions please email info@geomywp.com or visit http://www.geomywp.com
